Note 										 																 																 Note 																 															 	 													 																	 Reference period: 2022 																	 Source: 																		 																		 	Small Area Estimation 																		 																	 																	 	This wage estimate is produced using a Small Area Estimation (SAE) model developed by Statistics Canada. For more information, please refer to the wage methodology document available at Search wages - Job Bank, or contact Statistics Canada at statcan.labour-travail.statcan@statcan.gc.ca
